subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I apologize for Jennifer
author: Kae Tee
full_text:
--0-651114711-1286256846=:37916
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Jennifer,
I had this long reply posted and for whatever reason I clicked se=
nd and it made me sign in again! It always seems to happen that way! (Espec=
ially when I sit here thinking oh.. the won't be interested in a personal e=
xperience!)
Ok, my son was a twin. He didn't know it. His twin died in uter=
o around the time the 2nd trimester started. They wanted to do a D&C becaus=
e they said if the one twin died he died too. They refused another ultrasou=
nd a few days later to "be sure" and I refused to allow them to do the surg=
ery as I had stopped bleeding and had no more issues after those first few =
days. I made an appointment with a new OB. I went in a few days later and t=
he first thing they did was an ultrasound. There was my son and his big str=
ong heartbeat just fine. If I wouldn't have went with my gut my 12 year old=
 wouldn't be here right now.
That being said.. several years ago he came to=
 me because he said this boy came to him, told him he was his twin in his d=
reams and talked to him. I didn't say much at the time because I was in sho=
ck. My husband had no clue about what happened with my first husband and my=
 pregnancy with him at that point.=C2=A0After what we experienced in 2004 i=
n a home we lived in I started to open my eyes to a lot and believe in thin=
gs that I never would have imagined.=C2=A0This "boy" has come around here a=
nd there to our son. He now knows he was a twin. Is it his brother? Honestl=
y, I do not know. I'd like to think perhaps it is and he's looking over him=
!
No one can explain certain things. Somethings might never have an explana=
tion. Some people can't handle this so if this happens it's no true because=
 there is no scientific explanation...=C2=A0
There are so many things that =
I've experienced in life that I'd love to be able to open up about. It took=
 everything I had back in 2004 to walk into the church rectory. I remember =
looking at our priest saying either there is something in our home or you n=
eed to commit me.=C2=A0I was raised don't talk about it, it's all your imag=
ination and just pull the covers over your head and go to sleep.=C2=A0Hugs,=
Teddy

--- On Mon, 10/4/10, jennifer <3eyesofwisdom@...> wrote:

From=
: jennifer <3eyesofwisdom@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: I apologize
To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, October 4, 2010, 3:50 PM











=




 
=C2=A0



  


    
      
      
      Yes, it was your post. I only=
 question what are subconscious may know that we do not. It is due to the w=
hole idea of automatic writing. I have written things I don't feel are from=
 me. Psychology would say it is probably just my subconscious. So I jump be=
tween realms of thought. I could downplay certain psychic abilities with ps=
ychology. It has left me wondering if I am really talking to my dead sister=
 or if it a way of processing the past. I forget the details, but I guess m=
y mom was going to have twins, but I was what came.

     I do know that ps=
ychology cannot explain certain things. Your post got me really interested =
in that device. I believe everything is connected. I do not doubt that you =
heard no sirens and such or your experience. I guess I just question how it=
 works, as all of us do here.

Thank you for your thoughts and prayers.



=
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Kae Tee <usmcmacswife@...> wrote:

>

> Jen=
nifer,

> 

> I had an iovulus tell me there was an accident with police et=
c is that was you were referencing?

> 

> If so, I had NO clue as where I =
live is out in farm land. I don't hear sirens unless it is late at night an=
d all our kids are in bed and it is dead silence in my home. That day our 3=
 kids were home and totally bouncing off the walls.. I was actually playing=
 with the device as I was in the bathroom and getting dressed, makeup etc. =
So there was no influence on what I heard.

> 

> I know a good house clean=
sing is wonderful! I am not sure what you are experiencing but I would like=
 you to know you will be in my thoughts and prayers!!

> 

> On Mon Oct 4th=
, 2010 2:45 PM EDT jennifer wrote:

> 

> >I have been silent out of fear. =
Sometimes the ridicule gets hard to take. I know that sometimes mind does i=
nfluence perception of reality. The other day I was brought back to quantum=
 physics. They talk of an observer and how just the observer being there ca=
n change things. I was thinking it is like when I sing. I sing much better =
when I am alone than when I think someone can hear me. 

> >     This goes =
into old teachings. the "As above , so below." A lot of people seem to beli=
eve humans are the only thing that feel and think. I do not believe this, a=
s I have witnessed strange occurrences.

> >We should be having someone ove=
r to bless our house soon. The energy needs cleansed and I feel too drained=
 to attempt it.

> >     I am very interested in one of the things posted. =
It was about Global consciousness project. Someone had posted about an expe=
rience where they were told by device about a wreck around the corner, or s=
omething like that. I wonder if their subconscious picked up on it and it m=
anifested on their device. I know it could be other things as well. As huma=
ns it is often us putting limits on what is possible that keeps us from our=
 full potential. At least thats my thoughts at this time.

> >   And don't =
give up just because others may not believe. In my invention books I have f=
ound  a lot of times it is those who are called crazy and mocked that actua=
lly progress things. Recently I read that Marconi was put in an asylum for =
telling them about the technology we use today. 

> >     I have many thoug=
hts. If I am to make a ghost box with the radio I have I am probably going =
to need help. I didn't make it far in my electronics course before getting =
ill. I want to read more throughout the site and others to see if I can do =
it without bothering anyone.

> >    I know I kind of come and go. I hope y=
ou don't mind. Everyone has always called me a free spirit. I tend to just =
go wherever my heart takes me. 

> >     

> >

>





    
     

    
   =
